Title: 39542 - # Ways to Deck Out Your Backyard This Summer
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 different ways that someone could spruce up or decorate their backyard this summer. You can give examples like updating outdoor furniture, adding a fire pit, decorating with trendy strung lights, or even venturing into planting some seasonal flowers. Your target audience is interested in a wide range of topics from décor and DIY, to gardening and recipes. So write for a broad audience. You can place your target URL in a section that discusses how hanging strung lights is a great backyard décor idea.
